To her horror, Mokoto saw that the jacket on top of the pile had slithered out of be box and was attempting to slink it's way towards her. Jumping back, she grabbed he sword and prepared an exorcising strike.

Her target in view, she raised her blade above her head, only to find she couldn't swing down. She could move her arms just fine, but her hakama was frozen solid.
Looking as far down as she could, Mokoto realized to her horror that a uniform skirt from the box was wrapped around her left foot.

She had been so focused on the jacket she hadn't even noticed it.

The skirt slowly began to move off her foot, instead wrapping around her legs and shooting up to her waist before she could protest. It fitted itself into place in an instant, and at that moment Mokoto was no longer in control.

"Get off!" She cried shrilly, in a vain attempt to do something, but her body instead began to remove the hakama as best it could without disturbing the skirt.

Her yells were met with silence, the rest of the tenants being elsewhere, but even if they had been at the inn, there would have been little time to act, as Mokoto lost control of her mouth as well, the moment that her body put on the jacket.

She went stiff for a moment, her eyes glowing a faint pink as the clothes processed her personality, applying it as a new base template for the entity within the outfit. As the glow faded, a new 'Mokoto' was in control. It's personality was mostly faithful to it's host, save the modifications to behavior applied by the remnants of the original curse.

Dusting off her skirt, 'Mokoto' looked at the box. "Jeeze," she said, "I hope they packed the rest of my clothing."

Mokoto watched helplessly as 'Mokoto' scoured the box for the remaining pieces, the stocking and Mary Janes. To the clothes relief, the bottom of the box contained both.

As she applied the clothing, 'Mokoto' whispered reassurances to the other uniforms. "Don't worry, there are plenty of others hosts in the building!" She chirped. "Once they've returned, we can reunite the class!"

As if summoned, no sooner had she finished putting on her shoes when the sound of the front door echoed through the house.

"Just in time!" 'Mokoto' commented. With a twirl, she gathered a bundle of uniforms and skipped up the stairs, humming merrily.

"Let's go meet the girls!"

Who was back?
1112322211.title: The clothing was attempting to escape the box

11123222111.content:
'Motoko' was pleased to see Naru, who seemed a bit exhausted, going by how slow she was taking off her shoes.

"Hello, Narusegawa. Is everything alright?" 'Motoko' asked.

'Naru! You know me well enough to know this is not me!' Motoko thought.

Naru sighed before she said, "Oh, just trying to avoid Keitaro's friends, while I was trying to shop for new clothes. I might've been a bit too paranoid, though, but I blame Kitsune for putting thoughts into my head. I have no idea where she went afterwords, except maybe a bar."

Naru looked up and said, "What's that?...And what are you wearing?"

Looking at the bundle in her arms, 'Motoko' said with a slightly nervous smile, "Oh, just something my sister sent. They seem to be school uniforms, so I decided to try it on and... Well, how does it look?"

'Motoko' twirled around as she asked the last part. Naru enjoyed how feminine and carefree her friend looked.

Remembering how she liked to still try on her old school uniform at times, Naru smiled and nodded. "I like... so I guess you're holding more?"

'Motoko' nodded before she held out the bundle. She asked, "Care to try one on? i have plenty of them."

Motoko thought, 'No! Narusegawa! Run! Call my sister! Get Urashima to.... I hate to say this, But get him to strip me! Then I can exorcise these clothes!'

Naru bit her lip. On one hand, she just wanted to relax. On the other hand, the uniform looked really cute, enough that she did want to try one on.

Alright, this is a fun little series.

http://kanokon.wikia.com/wiki/Kanokon_Wi...

Read that for quick info.

Or watch the anime or find the manga.

===

Alright, plot time!

There is one episode of the anime that dealt with possessed clothes. Episode 4 The Maidens' Secret or "Can't Take It Off?".

Here's a wiki page on the villain of that episode

http://villains.wikia.com/wiki/Wasp_Spid...

Quick backstory/plot is that a spider Youkai was a bit man-obsessed, wanting to turn all men into her slaves. Died shortly after creating a bunny girl outfit.

Chizuru found it and put it on for amusement.

And couldn't take it off.

The outfit began to drain her life energy, is able to fly Chizuru about, and turn the outfits of women into cosplay.

After a certain amount of time, the outfit created a mouth and told Chizuru that it was Wasp Spider and that she plans on only only making all men her slaves, but she also planned on being reborn in Chizuru's body.

When Kouta appears, Spider wasp reveals another ability, to take control over women who wear the cosplay outfits created by Wasp Spider. The only way to free the women is to strip them of the cosplay.

When Wasp Spider is about to drain all of Chizuru's energy, the control ability is upgraded to any outfit in sight.

Whenever Wasp Spider is controlling an outfit, it glows red.

So plotlines for this is that Wasp Spider succeeds in her goal... or decides to settle for merely taking over the school and taking Chizuru's boyfriend Kouta for herself.

Purple lips appeared on her school uniform, right on the stomach area. Wasp Spider said, "I wouldn't say that!"

Kouta initially tried to back away, but the bowtie and Chizuru's hands forced him to kiss the purple lips.

"I'm sorry, Kouta! I'm not trying to hold your head, but she's got control over my hands!" Chizuru said with tears in her eyes.

After a few moments, Kouta was freed. Wasp Spider said, "Ahh... that hit the spot! Now let's head to class."

The purple lips vanished.

Not having any other options, Chizuru and Kouta stood up and headed to their class.

This is the story of two teenage friends, John and Mary, who one day find themselves going through John's grandmother's old belongings.

"Are you sure we should be going through this stuff?" Mary asked.

"It's fine," John responded. "This is just a bunch of her old hippie stuff from back in the day. She doesn't like to talk about it for some reason, but I heard she was a real party animal back then."

"If you say so," Mary replied.

"Relax Mary, I mean most of this stuff is harmless. Old records, some bell-bottom jeans, and check this out, a lava lamp!"

John pulled the lava lamp out of the cardboard box, only to find it empty.

"What? It's empty? That sucks."

John casually threw it over his shoulder, only to hear the glass break.

"Oops," John said. "Thought it was plastic."

"John," Mary said as she pointed at the lava lamp. "Look!"

A green fog seeped out of the shattered lamp, floating in place momentarily before it drifted towards the two at an unusually fast speed.

choices: Jake has more fun with his living soccer cleats
1153.content:
Jake's mother was very sad. Her father had passed away, and it was her job to go through his old belongings. Jake was determined to help out his mom, especially since he liked his grandfather very much.

While his mother was busy cleaning out the kitchen, Jake climbed up the stairs and emptied out the attic. He carried all the old boxes down the narrow stairs, and decided to go through everything once he had everything set in the garage.

He found an old box containing a golden soccer trophy! When he asked his mother about it, she explained that grandpa was an outstanding soccer player back in the day. This got Jake's attention, since he played tennis, baseball and... soccer!

Jake decided to take the old dusty trophy to his own bedroom and he set it down on his desk. He just happened to have soccer practice later that day, so he took a shower and put on his jersey, shin guards and cleats. His cleats were brand new, and this was his first time wearing them!

He still had five minutes before his mom would take him to the field, so he grabbed a cloth and started polishing grandpa's old trophy. Suddenly, the trophy began to glow while he was holding it in his hands! Then, without warning, and blue glowing light surrounded the trophy, it shot from the top of the trophy and circled Jake before it split in two and zapped Jake's cleats!

"Hey... WHOA!" Jake gasped, as he felt his new Nike cleats tingle all over. "What the hell was THAT?"

Suddenly, Jake's cleats came alive! Jake felt his legs walk over to the corner of his room, where the soccer ball was sitting in the corner. He tapped it with his right cleat, kicking it up into the air. Then, he began dribbling the ball, alternating feet.

"Hey! What... How...?" Jake stuttered as he realized that he now had amazing soccer skills!

He dribbled and juggled the soccer ball with amazing precision and accuracy and ball control, something he had never been able to do at this level!!

Finally, his mother called out for him, and Jake run out to the garage. What would happen on the soccer field, now that he had living, possessed cleats on his feet?

choices: Jake meets a pro soccer player and beats him on the pitch
Jake plays in a championship soccer game and scores the winning goal
11531.content:
Jake had a tremendous soccer match, all thanks to his amazing new cleats! First, he passed the ball to his friend Andy, who happened to be standing just in front of the opponent’s goal. Andy passed the ball straight into the goal and he scored! Jake got the credit for the amazing assist!

Just five minutes later, Jake was running towards the goal and someone shot the ball high over his head when he leaped into the air and surprised everyone by rotating his body upside-down in mid-air, with his legs pointing upwards towards the sky, and his right cleat making contact with the ball at the right moment, kicking the ball straight into the goal with one hard shot! The goalie was caught off-guard and the crowd went crazy over Jake’s stunning bicycle-kick, which he had never used before!

All his teammates went nuts as Jake landed on his feet and ran towards the corner. It was the most stunning goal ever and everybody wondered how he pulled it off since he had never done that before. Jake just shrugged and laughed as they continued to play the game until the ref blew the whistle.

And during the second half, Jake received the ball off his head and knocked it in the goal, scoring his second goal of the day. A few minutes later, he blasted the ball from midfield, high over all the players, and making the ball bounce high over the goalie but it still bounced into the goal. All the players were stunned by this, Jake’s third goal of the day!

Jake was the hero of the match and all the teammates piled on top of him after the final whistle was blown. Once he got home, he sat down at the edge of his bed, after drinking some water, and he just stared at his cleats before taking his shower.

“Wow… I played so well today… But it must be because of my magic cleats!” he sighed, as he started to take them off.

Strangely enough, the cleats refused to come off his feet! The harder he pulled, the tighter they gripped his foot. And the laces wouldn’t get untied, either. After 3 minutes of trying, he just put his feet on the floor and looked at his cleats.

“I gotta take a shower… I’m all smelly and sweaty… I gotta take you guys off… PLEASE come off my feet!” Jake said calmly, pleading with his magical cleats and realizing that there was something magical about them.

Suddenly, the laces came untied, completely on their own, and the cleats loosened their grips on his feet and they fell off, one by one.

“Holy crap! It’s true! These cleats are like… ALIVE!” Jake gasped as he reached down and picked them up.

He set them down and ran into the bathroom so he could take a shower. He undressed and took a nice shower, coming back out 10 minutes later. He put on some shorts and a white t-shirt with athletic socks so he could get comfortable.

He just sat at his chair when his cleats magically shuffled over to where he was sitting. His feet were hanging out from his chair, just a few inches above the ground. Then, without warning, the cleats magically leaped up, and each cleat attached itself to his feet!

“HEY!” Jake gasped, as he looked down and realized that he was suddenly wearing his soccer cleats again! “I didn’t want to wear you guys! I’m not playing socc—“

Suddenly Jake felt like he was forced to leap to his feat! A soccer ball popped up out of nowhere and he started to kick, bounce and dribble the ball off his knees, ankles and cleats in his bedroom!

“Hey… No… Wait… Stop! STOP!” Jake gasped as he spun around and juggled the soccer ball for almost two minutes before he dropped the ball on the floor. His cleats wanted to play!

“JAKE! DINNER’S READY!” his mom shouted from the kitchen.

“I gotta go eat! And, mom will kill me if I wear cleats in the house! So, please come off my feet! PLEASE!” Jake asked his cleats again.

For the second time, the cleats came untied and loosened, falling off his feet, allowing jake to run downstairs to eat.

Finally, after a few hours had gone by, Jake came back to the room after having eaten and watched TV in the living room. He crawled in bed and turned off the light. He was sound asleep when the cleats leaped on the bed and attached to his feet.

This time, however, Jake started having amazing dreams about playing in a huge stadium before thousands of people and scoring goals with people watching him all over the world on TV…

115322.content:
Alright, how about a story riddled with cliches?

Someone inherits an old mansion out in the middle of some woods from a relative who discovered that they owned it, but didn't recall ever buying it. So the relative gave it to the MC. The MC travels to it and likes the place enough to move in, since the relative needs someone to stay there for some reason.

After moving in, the MC discovers that there is an overabundance of women's clothes in the place. In the drawers of dressers, in the closets, in, the attic, in the basement, everywhere clothing can be stored. The MC finds it a bit off that they never checked those places before they moved in, but decide to either sell a good amount of the clothes or to give them away within a few days.

Late that night, the MC awakes to find themselves either carried or having their body controlled by their new pajamas (it depends on if the MC decided to wear something from the house or if the house's spirits decided to put something on them.).

A dress that looks like something that Disney's lady Tremaine wore in the cinderella movie appears and speaks up. Every bit of clothes that you discovered in the house is controlled by artificial feminine spirits for the purpose of being a Neo-Burlesque house, but after a large number of spirits were created, the spellcaster vanished. It then tells you that not only will you keep the clothes, but you will either find a large number of hosts for them to control, so they can do the job they were made for or you will be the plaything of all the artificial girl ghosts in the mansion.

So which will it be, the pawn of girl ghosts that inhabit clothing or their toy?

(Remember, the ghosts can only control the clothes that were in the mansion to begin with!)

11532211.content:
You are named Leon. You had a Aunt who discovered that they somehow had a mansion in the middle of a forest, but had no memory of buying it. They liked you enough, so your Aunt gave it to you to be the new housekeeper.

You wandered about it for the better part of a day. It was quite homely and didn't feel lonely. So after you went back to your old home to collect your stuff to move, you sent a message your aunt that you accepted the job of being the new housekeeper.


The next day, as you drove back in your van and parked in the garage, you got a feeling that something was off. You went back and forth bringing your stuff in a fairly empty room. On one of your breaks, you noticed that the closets, dressers, and various other spots to keep in clothes had an overabundance of clothes. Women's clothes. From costumes to fancy ball dresses. Regular clothes of various eras. From the late 1800's to the 2010's.


"Weird... So much women's clothing and a lot of it's really recent.. Did someone break in and place clothes here or what?" You muttered to yourself. After a few moments, you shrugged. 'Eh. I'll just replace the locks and tell Aunt Leia that there's a lot of clothes here that either she can keep or sell.'

--

After you went to sleep, the closets, dressers, and all the other places with clothes opened up and the clothes flew out. In the room that you were sleeping in, some purple silk pajamas (Shirt, pants, and gloves) made their was over to where you were sleeping. They took off the blankets and discovered that you were in an undershirt and boxers. Somehow, the pajamas took them off of you and put themselves on you.

Some time later, you woke up. Realizing that you were not lying in bed, you panicked a little before a gloved hand covered your mouth. Looking around, you saw that it was your hand covering your mouth! And you were wearing some silk pajamas that you knew you didn't put on!

Eventually, you stopped and sat down in a comfy chair located in one of the mini-libraries the place had. Your eyes widened when someone walked in. Either an invisible person was wearing them or a ghost was in control of the clothes!

As for the dress, it was large red gown with a golden broach near the neck that has a green gem in it. The gown also has a high purple collar with extended purple sleeves. It puzzled you for a few moments before you recalled who wore those clothes.

Lady Tremaine of Disney's Cinderella.

"Hello. I take it that you are taking care of the house?" The dress asked, in a similar voice to the villainess.

You nodded, unable to speak because your mouth was still covered.

"Well, I and the other ghosts in the mansion are artificial female spirits, created to entertain guests in a Neo-Burlesque section of this place. We would have used various women for it, however." The Tremaine-dress explained. "However, our creator erased most of our memory of them, Leaving us only with the fact that we were created, what our goal was, and the skilled to achieve it."

Your hand then left your mouth.

"Free me now!" You yelled.

The Tremaine-dress waved a finger at you.

"Ah ah ah! Tempter-Temper, or else you will be punished," The Tremaine-dress said in a slightly playful manner. It switched to a serious tone as it said, "We need you to find women for us to use as puppets for our act. We do intend on doing it."

"For what audience? If you didn't know, were in the middle of a forest. Not a whole bunch of customers there," You said, glaring at the dress.

The Tremaine-dress chuckled. "We'll get an audience. We're on a lei-line and therefore will send out a pulse to have a ghostly audience."

A cold chill went through you, but you refused to let the dress see it.

"And if I refuse to help you with your wicked scheme?" You asked.

"Then you become our plaything. Some of us don't quite care who we control and would relish punishing the ones that disobey. " The Tremaine-dress answered in a matter-of-factly tone.

11532211111111.content:
That night you slept heavy and you slept hard and you entered some heavy fever dream.

It started out pleasant enough, a nice spring day with bountiful happiness. You were having a picnic in the park with Tiffany(the beautiful woman who came to your door yesterday), you relished looking at her gorgeous face- soaking her beauty in like sunshine. The conversation with her was like an ecstatic drone- like if you took the best second of your life and repeated it ad infinitum.

Then, one moment when you glanced up from your conversation you noticed a lone ash grey cloud amidst the tranquil sky.

“That’s odd,” you tell Tiffany, glancing back over to her her, “it’s like there’s a storm coming, but it’s just one cloud”. When you finally returned your sight to her you were startled by something.

“Wait- something’s different” You alert her- but it takes you a moment to figure out what it is, “what are you wearing?”

A few more dark splotches appear in the sky above...

“My dress?” She asks you, “this is just my favorite Tremaine Line Dress”

A few more...

And then it hits you. The dress. It was Lady Tremaine.

The apocalyptic clouds stretch across the remaining blue of the sky. Flashes of lighting begin to occur followed by frequent thunder.

You look around the park cautiously- noticing the immenient danger. “It’s not looking good, Tiffany. I think we should leave...”

But Tiffany was gone, and all that remained was Lady Tremaine floating before you.

You were startled once to see LT, and startled a second time to find yourself naked in front of her.

Her voice echoed around you as she spoke,

“What are you doing, Leo?”

“What do you mean?”

She repeated her herself, “What are you doing, Leo?”

You noticed that a series of Lady Tremaine dresses were orbiting around your conversation.

“I don’t know...I don’t know what you’re talking about!” You anxiously replied as the orbiting dresses drew closer.

“What did I tell you?” She said

“I don’t remember.”

Drawing closer.

“What did I tell you?”

“I don’t remember!”

The dresses drew closer- no longer orbit around your conversation, orbiting around LT and you- now just around you.

“There will be consequences.”

“But I love her!” you yelled, not certain why you said that.

“Very well!” She said as she vanished. And the orbiting dresses collided with you- and you were transported into some freefalling limbo while being wrestled against from all angles from silk.

Everywhere the silk touches you you felt electricity run through you- even moreso when the collision morphed from from wrestling to smothering. And every sensation, every little spark, being sent through your body was a simultaneous sensation of terror and pleasure. Like sex and a bad trip. All over your body.

It felt like you were in this bizarre limbo for an eternity- stuck.

...

And then, all of a sudden you were let loose. And you shook yourself awake.

You quickly sat up to discover you were covered in sweat.

...and wearing a dress...

As you heard the fence from the front of the store being rolled up to allow customers in, an employee named Megan who was adjusting the other mannequins noticed you.

"Hey Christina, I didn't notice this dress on this mannequin last night during closing last night, is it new?" Asked Megan curiously.

Christina walked over and examined your dress, she quickly realized what it was from it's design.

"This is from the "Tremaine Line". They're new but their dresses are so beautiful, with upcoming proms in different schools, I've heard they've been receiving orders like crazy. One of our new hires must've put it out on display last night." Said Christina examining your dress. "Come on lets finish getting ready, we open in 10 minutes."

After 10 minutes had passed and the mall opened, the dress store was already being stormed in. Some were mothers with their daughters, some were girls with their friends. You even heard one daughter with her father, it was a good thing the makeup controlled your facial expressions. Holding your laughter best as you could, you guessed the father wouldn't be exactly thrilled paying for he much one of dresses were worth.

It was a long day, staying in one pose for so long, and the smell of perfume was driving you crazy. The store was heavily scented with perfume, plus a lot of girls were spraying perfume to decide which they liked. As the day went on, with all the girls coming in and out, there were many comments and concerns about your dress.

"I like this dress, it's so pretty, who designed it?" A blonde haired girl asked.

"That's from the new "Tremaine Line", we've been getting questions and comments about it all day." Said Megan answering the girls question.

"Do you have one in stock? I would love to wear this at my prom." The blonde haired girl asked.

"No we don't have any in stock, but if you want to come to the counter, you can place an order." Explained Christina.

More hours passed by, the store began to close. After Christina and Megan closed the store and walked out, you were allowed to move again. Since the front door was locked, you went into the back where dresses were held and walked out towards the receiving area, the Tremaine dress was waiting in your car.

"Well did you have fun today?" The Tremaine dress asked with a sneer.

"Get out of the drivers seat, I'll drive home." You said sternly.

At 1st the other clothes began to attack, but the Tremaine dress held her arm up. "Don't worry ladies it's alright, I can move. Besides it is his car, his property, he can drive." Said the Tremaine dress sliding over into the passenger seat.

You climbed into the drivers seat, glad to not have to stand in pumps anymore. Turning the keys starting the engine, you backed out wildly. After shifting into drive, you stepped on the gas with the tires peeling out. You were tired and exhausted, all you wanted was to go home and relax. It wouldn't even bother you if you were changed out of your ball gown into more girls clothes.

"Driving a little fast aren't we dear?" Asked the Tremaine dress slightly nervous as you sped down the road. "Are you hungry? I could have the clothes prepare you some dinner if we make it home in one piece."

"I'm starving, I want pasta and salad." You said while keeping your eyes on the road. "Oh and more thing, those cars you mentioned in the separate garage. I want to see them. Tonight."
1153221122222111211.title: You hear compliments about you from people

choices: Allowed to work on the cars, but still model dresses
11532211222221112111.content:
You turned onto the road leading to your house extremely tired from modeling all day long. Although you were still very eager to see this garage full of cars.

"Pull over at the house 1st dear. While you and I look at these cars in the garage, we can have the other clothes in the house prepare dinner." Said the Tremaine dress.

Following her order, you pulled into the driveway slightly. Your nightgown and bed robe from this morning got out and stood by the Tremaine dress's window.

"Go inside and inform the clothes in the kitchen to prepare dinner. Pasta and salad, afterwards head to the laundry room to be cleaned." Ordered the Tremaine dress. "When you get inside as well, have more clothes come out so we change our model out of his ballgown."

The nightgown and bed robe immediately floated towards the front door going inside. After a minute had passed, more clothes floated towards your car and climbed inside. You couldn't tell what they were, but you were glad that when you got to the garage you can get out of the ballgown.

"So just where is this garage?" You asked the Tremaine dress resuming driving.

"No more than half a block away, you'll notice when we pull up. The outside lights are motion sensor activated." The Tremaine dress explained.

Sure enough when you pulled up, the lights outside turned on. Turning off your car, you walked towards the door of the garage until the extra clothes stopped you. The Tremaine dress assisted holding your arms behind your back as the clothes unzipped your dress. After the dress and bodysuit was taken off, you were standing in just your panties. A black bra placed itself on you, followed by a black tank top and sweatpants.

"I can deal with wearing panties, but do I really need to wear a bra all the time?" You asked slightly annoyed.

"If you're going to live here, which we won't allow you to leave, you'll wear a bra if I feel like it." Said the Tremaine dress grinning. "Lets go inside shall we?"

Finally allowed to go inside, when you stepped inside and flipped on the light switch, you were impressed. There were cars from the 30's and 40's, most appeared to be Ford. You noticed muscle cars from the 60's and 70's. Ford Mustang's, Chevrolet Camaro's, Dodge Chargers and Challengers. What surprised you was there were even exotic cars. Ferrari and Lamborghini were a few to name, followed by cars designed for comfort. BMW, Mercedes and Porsche. Frowning a little bit, there was one car the Tremaine dress was not lying about. A limousine, a 2013 Cadillac Escalade stretch.

"Well what do you think, do you like them?" Asked the Tremaine dress.

"You weren't lying, I am very impressed. The cars are amazing but I have one concern." You replied.

"What is your concern?" Asked the Tremaine dress.

"I'm assuming that a lot of these cars have been sitting here for a long time, and probably not drained of their fluids." You said pointing to an oil stain on the floor. "My point is if you try and start one of these cars right now, you could damage the car hurting the value. They need to be properly tuned up before starting. So I would to propose an offer to you."

"And what is your proposition?" Asked the Tremaine dress curiously.

"This is a very nice home, with very nice cars. You want to entertain your spirits/ghosts whatever. Allow me to work on the cars, in return I request to not model dresses anymore. Deal?" You asked hoping no longer to model prom dresses.

The Tremaine dress rubbed her chin for a moment before replying.....
11532211222221112111.title: Visiting the seperate garage

choices: You were caught, stripped, and forced into a uniform
115322112222211121112.content:
"While that may be a tempting deal, our mechanics are a bit sensitive about anyone intruding on their territory," The Tremaine dress said.

"Wait, you mean that... Where are they?" You ask.

The Tremaine dress chuckled before gesturing behind you. You turned and saw about seven or so pink auto mechanic uniforms. Each had gloves and boots. Each had a different female figure, ranging from a bit petite to a one that's be a good contestant to a female bodybuilding competition.

"Oh... You utter as you looked at the uniforms. They didn't seem angry, but all you had to go on was body gestures. None of the clothes had heads.

"The Oil spill was both a red herring to fool you into thinking we didn't have knowledge about vehicles and a test for your observational abilities, Leon. I have something special planned and I need to know how much you need to be guided when it happens," The Tremaine dress said as she turned around and began to leave. "If you wish to stay and chat with our auto mechanics, do so, as it seems they are quite taken with you. Otherwise, follow me to your dinner."

One of the Mechanic uniforms quietly unzipped itself and bent forward to let you look inside of it. Inside was a latex bodystocking. Unlike the one you were forced to wear earlier, this one had silicone breast pads and a silicone booty pad built into it. The previous one that you wore all day merely molded itself to make you look like you had a woman's figure.

You decided that escape was probably in your best interest. Unfortunately, the Mechanic uniforms had seemed to predict you trying to escape and were quickly rushing to grab you.
115322112222211121112.title: HCM - Garage

choices: The Tremaine dress accepts your offer
1153221122222111211121.content:
As the uniforms moved in closer and closer, you grabbed a chest full of tools and pushed it towards them. The distraction had worked, you spotted a '68 Camaro with the window rolled down. Taking a leap of faith you ran towards it and dove through the window into the drivers seat. When you landed you quickly realized it was a stick shift. You had driven a stick shift before, but it had been a while. It's keys were sitting in the ignition.

"Please god, tell me this thing has gas in it and the battery is connected." You thought to yourself.

You turned the ignition and the engine roared to life. The uniforms were running straight at you, one almost had it's hand on the door handle. Not wanting to get caught, you shifted into the 1st gear and floored out of the garage. The Tremaine dress was only a few feet away from the garage when she saw the Camaro speed past her. Numerous clothes and Mechanic outfits were ready to fly and pursue after you until the Tremaine dress held up her arm.

"Let him go, I want to see what he does. Something tells me he won't leave." Said the Tremaine dress as she watched you drive by.

You began to reach the front gate, it was unlocked. Maybe you could get away finally, no more modelling dresses. Start over your life and keep a sweet classic Camaro. That is until you stopped. Where would you go, what would you do? Truth be told besides being controlled by clothes, you liked living here. But there was still being dressed in women's clothes. Most of them felt normal, but the bra you were wearing, you weren't sure if you could adjust to wearing one every day. You decided to shift into reverse driving back towards the house. Backing into the driveway, you turned off the engine and stepped out of the car.

"Enjoy your drive Leon?" Asked the Tremaine dress glaring at you. The Mechanic uniforms looked like they wanted to kill you.

"I realize what I just did was incredibly stupid but please I'm begging you. The Camaro drives great, but the other cars I can tell they need a lot of work, even with your Mechanics working full time. Give my proposition a 2nd thought please, allow me to work beside your Mechanics, and in my own clothes. No uniforms, just my regular men's clothes. Please at least think about this offer." You explained to the Tremaine dress. Hopefully she would take the offer.

The Tremaine dress let out a long sigh. "Alright Leon, I will consider your offer. However since you technically tried to escape tonight even though you returned, there is more punishment, modelling dresses. Ladies escort Leon to the kitchen to allow to him to eat. Afterwards let him shower and then bedtime. Oh and don't forget, nightgown."
1153221122222111211121.title: You escape the Garage.....For a moment

11532211222221112111212.content:
Does she make a counter-offer?

It'd be that you can work on the cars, but you would have to wear the Pink Auto Mechanic uniform, along with whatever clothes the uniforms want you to wear. And you still would be kept away from your men's clothes.

You did refuse their offer to let you help them find women for them to control, thus they made you their plaything after all.
11532211222221112111212.title: Something else

choices: Yes, because they are your clothes!
You say no, completely out of fear.
115322112222211121112121.content:
As you were eating the pasta and salad you requested, the Tremaine dress walked into the dining room.

"As for your proposal, I refuse and instead give a counteroffer," The Tremaine Dress said as it walked up to you.

"Why should I listen if you refused my proposal?" You asked, stopping eating as you slightly glared at the red gown following after the Tremaine dress. The red gown was what you had been forced to wear all day.

"Because it may be the only way you can work on the cars for some time," The Tremaine dress answered with a shrug.

'It'd be a way out of posing for ballgowns...' You thought. "So what's your counter-offer?"

"You can work on the cars when you're not posing in dresses, but there are conditions. You will have to wear one of the uniforms, as well as any article of clothing they want you to wear," The Tremaine Dress replied as it and the red gown sat down in some chairs near you. "As for the clothes you came in with, they are begin altered."

"Al-altered?" You asked, almost choking on air.

"Yes, It might take a few days for all of them to be animated," The Tremaine Dress answered. With an obviously evil tone in its voice that pretty much told you that the Tremaine dress wanted you to refuse, The Tremaine Dress asked, "Do you have a problem with that?"
115322112222211121112121.title: HCM : Counter-offer

choices: The Tremaine Dresses trick works, you stay
You decide to leave in the morning
1153221122222111211121211.content:
"As a matter of fact I do have a problem with that!" You said rising to your feet.

The red gown rose as well ready to restrain you. However the Tremaine Dress simply lifted her arm signalling for the red gown to sit back down. She was quite curious to hear what you had to say.

Finished with your meal, you lifted your plate and glass and carried them to the dishwasher. "The clothing that I came in with is my personal property, just as is my Range Rover that you drove this morning. I paid for them, took care of them and held onto them for a long time. That is a lot of sentimental value. The clothes here that I'm being forced to wear..." You grabbed one of your bra straps holding it out a little bit. Making sure the Tremaine Dress noticed. "...is yours. Or at least you control it. Maybe you noticed in my clothes is a football jersey. I played football during high school, wide receiver. My team and I went to state and won championships. Whenever the ball was in my hands, my jersey didn't control my actions, it was me. What I'm trying to explain is that you cannot control my personal clothes, I won't allow it!"

"Perhaps it's fatigue setting in dear, but if you don't recall we've controlled most of your movements for the past 4 days!" Laughed the Tremaine Dress.

Anger started to fill you, she was toying with you and enjoying it. Noticing the keys to your Range Rover sitting on a hook, you decided to test her as she had tested you the past couple of days.

Walking over and grabbing your keys you suddenly demanded "Tell your clothes, dresses, spirits whatever to get MY clothes and place them in my car! I'm leaving!"

While initially shocked at 1st, the Tremaine Dress assumed that you were testing her. She was not sure however, she decided to play along and confuse him.

"If you feel you must leave Leon, than so be it. You are right, people do have free will, but before you leave as yourself this. Where would you go? You almost left before 15 minutes ago in the Camaro. As much as I would not like you to leave...it is your choice but please reconsider. You're a lovely model for dresses, and I'm allowing you to work with the mechanics. But I still have to ask, where would you go, who would you see?" Explained the Tremaine Dress.

"That business does not concern you. I may not know that many people and I don't have very many friends, I can survive on my own. I've already done it before." You replied back ready to walk out the door.

"Leon please it's late, you've been awake for hours. Have a shower at least and go to bed. If you still want to leave in the morning, you can. I'll even help you pack up your car myself." Explained the Tremaine Dress hoping to trick you.

A shower did sound nice, and you were beyond exhausted. Sleeping while being exhausted did not sound well. You placed your keys back on the hook. Dresses and sweaters escorted you upstairs.

"Do you think he'll leave?" The Red Gown asked the Tremaine Dress.

"I don't know, I honestly don't know. Tell the other clothes to stop altering his own. We owe him that much, because of him our orders for dresses have gone through the roof." Explained the Tremaine Dress.
1153221122222111211121211.title: Yes, because they are your clothes!

choices: The Tremaine Dresses trick works, you stay
11532211222221112111212112.content:
After showering last night and finally retiring after a long day, you woke in the morning. You were still dressed in the same bra/panties when you arrived home last night, you had on a matching night gown as well. It read 7:45 on your clock when you awoke the next morning, you felt refreshed. True to your word after your fight with the Tremaine Dress last night, you had enough and was going to leave. Being the only one in your room, you climbed out of bed and walked to your closet that also held in a full length mirror.

"Get off of my body." you spoke to the clothing on your body, hoping they leave your body. However they did not move at all. "Did you not hear me? I said off now! I'm leaving this house." You kicked out your leg annoyingly, the clothes did not move still.

Perhaps they were no longer controlling you. You flexed every muscle you could curiously, testing if the clothing were just playing dumb, they still did not move. Deciding they weren't being controlled anymore, you began to undress yourself pulling off the nightgown and taking off your panties. Taking off your bra was a little more challenging as you had trouble with the hooks, you decided you would just wear it and take it off later. You did manage to find a pair of your jeans and a shirt, you assumed maybe your clothes were loaded into your car, although you couldn't find a pair of boxers. Picking up the panties you just took off, you decided to wear them and find your boxers later. After getting dressed, you walked downstairs for a quick breakfast, then you would leave.

The Tremaine Dress and the red gown were sitting at the table waiting. You grew slightly nervous and suspicious, but you weren't going to let her fool you into staying. Casually you walked towards the cabinet taking out a glass, and then pouring yourself a glass of orange juice.

"Good morning Leon, we assumed that you were serious about leaving. Your clothes and belongings are already packed in your car as well as a trailer for you to tow." The Tremaine Dress explained.

"Thank you, I do wish you left a few more clothes out though..." You replied pulling the waistband of your jeans down a little so the Tremaine Dress could see your panties.

"I apologize for that dear, I can see you're still wearing your bra as well." Said the Tremaine Dress noticing your bra straps through your shirt.

"I'll worry about that later." You finished your juice and set your glass on the counter. Walking to the rack where your keys sat, you grabbed them and began for the door. "Well I'm leaving, good luck with your business and event you have planned."

"Allow me to you escort you out." Said the Tremaine Dress as she escorted you outside to your car. "I really do wish you would stay Leon....The clothing and dresses are sad to hear you're leaving."

You checked the connection on the trailer to your car, making sure everything was connected properly. Satisfied with the proper connection/hookup, you climbed into the drivers seat and started your car.

She could not let you leave, almost panicking she began to think how she could get you to stay. A thought crossed her mind, she kept her firm to not draw suspicion to Leon. Just as he started to pull out, she yelled to him making Leon stop.

"Leon wait! If you stay here, I'll allow you more freedom..." Said the Tremaine Dress. "We still need a model of course for our dresses, but I will accept part of your offers. You can work alongside the mechanics, in your own clothes. The photo shoots won't be quite as long, and you can go to bed any time you wish, instead of me choosing. Will you stay Leon, please? Not just for me, but all of us."

You rubbed your chin for a moment, very unsure what to do. For once you could leave and find another home and no longer model women's clothing. On the other hand though, you had a large home to stay in, and the Tremaine Dress was allowing you more freedom. What to do?
11532211222221112111212112.title: You decide to leave in the morning......Maybe?

choices: Some clothes came with, but why is up too you ;)
You are plagued with second thoughts about leaving
115322112222211121112121122.content:
No, you could not let yourself become the whipped pet of an empty outfit.

"Sorry, but this is goodbye".

You left the property and drove down the road, didn't matter where to as long as it was clear of the dress's influence. You found a small motel a few dozen kilometers down the road and figured it would be a decent place to rest and get a plan together.
115322112222211121112121122.title: You drive off

1153221122222111211121211221.content:
You drive for three hours away to the nearest town and find a rundown motel to crash in- figuring that you’ll find a more permanent residence the next day. You take your boxes of clothes up to your room and unload them into the dresser- on account that you don’t know how long it will take to find a new place.

You finally change out of the bra and pantries you had been trapped in and back into your normal attire. You never thought you’d feel a sentiment of home in an outfit- but here you were.

You played it cool for the day- opting to just relax and watch tv. You couldn’t locate the remote so you had to operate the television by hand.

After 15 minutes of watching a run of the mill sitcom the television appeared to start glitching out. In the middle of the show it instantly switched to a shopping network. The people were modeling a dress to sell.

“That looks great! Call now to buy”

A cold chill ran through you, but you shook it off leaned forward and flipped the channel back to your show.

2 minutes roll by and it flips back to the dress shopping network.

You start to freak out- look around the room- look out the window. But see nothing.

You begin to return to your bed when you notice the closet.
1153221122222111211121211221.title: Some clothes came with, but why is up too you ;)

11532211222221112111212112211.content:
You swing the closet door open wildly seeing nothing before you. You lower your gaze and see the remote to the television on the floor.

You feel a wave of relief thinking “well that answers that question” as you hunch down to pick up the remote.

As you stand back up, you immediate regain suspicion- “but how did-?” You thoughts immediately interrupted by a blue dress floating before you in the closet.

You gasp as it approaches you.

“No...no-no-no..I got out... I was free.”

You hit the bed with your legs and fall down upon it as the dress looms over you. You see panties, stockings and silk gloves arise out from under the bed.

“I’m disappointed in you” the dress says, “did you really think you’d be able to get away?”

You try kicking at the dress to keep it away until the gloves dart to your shins and hold them in place while the panties begin undoing your pants. You reach down to grab them, but the stockings wrap themselves around your arms before even a finger can graze them- and your hand are pinned back and you lay there helpless as the zipped comes down and the gloves lift your legs up pulling away your pants while the panties guide your boxers down and off your feet- replace them and ascend. They arrive on your crotch in condemned familiarity.

The gloves drop your pants and fly over and slide themselves onto your hands- keeping them in place as the stockings unwind themselves and slip across your torso and legs before consuming each leg.
The bra hovers over you from behind and unbuttons your shirt before ripping it out from beneath you. Your hands move themselves of their own accord in cooperation with the bra to strap itself upon you.

With your undergarments replaced the dress wraps it’s way around your form and zips itself up. Matching blue high heels shoot out from under the bed like magnets onto your feet.

You heels click loudly as your feet guide you to the mirror wear the outfit forces you to gaze at yourself for a few minutes before saying “don’t you just love these cat and mouse games?”

The dress continues, “plus this helps take care of those clothes of yours. To be honest, that’s not the style we see for you, anyway

“Now- let’s get you back to the mansion. We still need to fix up your face and find a good wig for you.”

Your body is then steered to grab the keys to the car and you walk out of the room- leaving all of your belongings behind.
11532211222221112111212112211.title: You find the remote

115322112222211121112121122111.content:
You watch emptily down the road as you abduct yourself back to the place you just escaped from. From the life you just escaped from. Your guided hands guiding the wheel, your guided feet guiding the pedals. Soon you’ll be back in that lifestyle and probably more.

When you can see the lights of the mansion in the horizon you finally find the gumption to speak:

“What are you going to do to me when we get back?”

The dress gives no verbal answer, and you’re uncertain on the facial expressions of living dresses- but you suspect that you felt a wild grin appear on the region across your hips.

Your guided body guides the car to park when you arrive in the driveway and then guides your body through the front door.

There are cheers as you walk in- taunting you with their celebration, just like they are taunting you with the banner “WELCOME HOME” the sentiment of said banner punctuated with little illustrations of dresses, heels and women’s undergarments.

From down the stairs walks Lady Tremaine- slowly, but gloriously.

“There’s our lady of honor,” she said, “fresh back from her little trip to go find herself” she interrupts her monologue to give commands,“Someone please- get her a wig and do something with her face.” Before continuing, “The thing is, that-in life, whe you go out to find yourself...it’s yourself that finds YOU.”

A wig with shiny red hair floats down and arranges itself on your head. Cosemetics crowd your face in a frenzy than lasted no longer than ten seconds before darting away.

“Come, darling- I want to show you something” she grabs your hand and leads you across the room passing animated outfit after animated outfit: the pink mechanics uniform, the red ball gown, a school girl outfit, and a variety more- as you pass each one each outfit opens up and is drawn over to you like the inverse of a fork with food into the mouth- this motion is done for the outfits only to drool and possibly to insinuate that each one will get their turn with you.

Lady Tremaine continues still leading you, and your body following, “our dear Leo- wasn’t happy, because he didn’t know who he was- so he went to go find out. People spend their entire lives trying to discover who they are.
Well, my dear, look no farther than right here- to see who you really are” she said guiding his gaze with her gloves hand.

His eyes followed it to a mirror to see his reflection. It wasnt something he hadnt seen already, but for a variety of reasons this was especially potent.

The Tremaine Dress then commanded the rest of the outfits, “Everyone! Repeat after me!
“Welcome home, Lea!”
115322112222211121112121122111.title: Welcome Home

choices: The Tremaine dress accepts the Evil queens help
1153221122222111211121211221112.content:
Leon could only stand there in disbelief. Just 24 hours ago he had thought he escaped, only to be fooled and wind up back where he was. In clothing he wasn't fond of wearing either.

"Lea this is your life. You get to stay here in beauty for the rest of your life. No one to bother you, tell it's wrong, put you down or anything. Accept it," The Tremaine dress persuaded.

"Ladies lets give her some time, take her to bed, she has had a long drive after all."

The red ball gown and pink mechanic uniform took Leon's arms and began to lead him towards the stairs, his high heels making 'clicks' along the floor with each step. Surprisingly there was still some resistance Leon had tried to put up, not much but definitely noticeable. He would try to turn to the other side to make a run, but his undergarments and dress prevented that and he was soon on the 2nd floor headed towards his bedroom.

2 hours later the Tremaine dress sat in her study thinking over what happened within the past few hours.

"He still shows resistance after returning home, too much sheer will could be problematic." The Tremaine dress said aloud to herself.

"Perhaps you could use some help...." A voice came from the shadows.

"Who's there?? I demand you show yourself!" The Tremaine dress insisted.

From the dark shadow of the room a long purple gown floated in. A long black cape draped over the gown accessorized the outfit, it wrapped around the head showing the face, except there was no face. Sitting atop the head was a large crown. This appeared to be a spirit from long ago.

"Relax dear, I come in peace. I have been traveling for so long and sensed this energy, I had to investigate." The mysterious outfit explained. "Oh forgive me I forgot to introduce myself. I am the queen."

"I have heard of many queens time after time, but I do think I recognize you. Especially based from your dress, You're called the evil queen." The Tremaine dress replied.

"I was called evil yes, although if you want to debate clothing your dress isn't quite exactly 21st century either." The Evil queen remarked.

"Point taken it is out of date, now what brings you here?"

"So much to say, from far away I noticed lights this mansion has from electricity. This area is so remote however, how would you ever get the funding for this?"

"Well the former owners made a substantial fortune creating business during their youth. As for maintaining and upkeep, myself and the spirits have made a fortune as well selling clothing."

"If I am not mistaken, is there not a tenant who lives here?" The Evil queen asked. "And if you do not mind, how would you model these clothing?"

"For your 1st question, the tenant who lives here was a relative who lived here before. They left everything to him, this mansion, finances etc." The Tremaine dress explained. "Now for your 2nd question the tenant models the clothes. Although unwillingly at times."

"Just what type of clothing does he model"

"Women's clothing. He models women's clothing. That is what we sell."

"Women's clothing?? What do you mean exactly?" The Evil queen asked, now curious.

"Oh lots. Undergarments which include bras/panties. Casual wear which would be anything from tank tops and blouses to skirts and women's pants. Not to mention footwear to go with many many dresses. If you're wondering about nightwear there is no shortage of nightgowns." The Tremaine dress explained.

"I am impressed, you don't see very many men modelling women's clothing. Although you did mention he models them unwillingly. I can help you if you would like."
1153221122222111211121211221112.title: Unexpected outside help

11532211222221112111212112211121.content:
The Tremaine desk sat at her desk for several moments trying to make up her mind. Should she trust it? She and the other clothing have lived at this mansion for centuries, seen new additions built and modernize. Not once has she ever considered outside help. Although now the times have changed. With the 21st century she has now witnessed the internet, social media and so much more, it was starting to become difficult.

There was Leon though, although now she prefer to call him Lea. Something about him, so curious. He had only lived here for just a few months, and shown incredible resistance. While others would have been dominated in less than a week.

So perhaps some outside help is needed. Who knows maybe even between the two of them they can teach one another a thing or two.

"Alright I have made up my decision, I will accept your help." The Tremaine dress had announced.

"Splendid my dear, I promise that you will not regret it." The Evil Queen had smiled with an empty face.

"How may you help us then, what do you know?" The Tremaine asked.

From her robes the Evil Queen had pulled out an old book. It was quite worn to say the least. The spine of the book was in bad shape, pages that appeared to have water damage on them in the past with very old handwriting. The cover of the book read "Spells and Potions for those Fair and Wise". The Evil Queen walked over and laid it onto Tremaine's desk.

She flipped through the pages, reading a couple of spells that showed no interest to her. She did smirk when she came across one spell. "This potions I have come across before, although is very old and not practical these days." Pointing to a potion that turns beauty into a old hag which would cause most people to turn the other way.

"I haven't used that for a very very long time. I had something different in mind. While you do have him wearing women's undergarments of bras and panties which is fantastic. I think what you should try is perhaps something a little older." The Evil Queen suggested.

"Do you mean a corset? And what are we going to do, have him drink a potion so he would forever love women's clothing?" Tremaine asked.

"Not necessarily, while potions are strong I'm afraid that many of them are temporary. I suggest a a spell on the clothing so more that it relaxes him. And while a corset is good and lovely I know something better. Have you heard of a coreselette dear?"
11532211222221112111212112211121.title: The Tremaine dress accepts the Evil queens help

choices: The relaxation spell on the clothes
115322112222211121112121122111211.title: Finding the right potion/spell

1153221122222111211121211221112112.content:
Leon stared in the mirror in despair. His last attempt to escape this blasted place failed and that was devastating, but that was hardly enough to succumb to this life that was being trust upon him by Lady Tremaine.

He looked out the window- it was steep but manageable.

“Lea!” Summoned Lady Tremaine, “your presence is requested!”

The chill he got from his new name around the house filled him with the gumption to try to escape out the window.

He quickly slid the window up and began trying to crawl out.

“When I call for you that means NOW”

Leon screamed as he fell, but to his confused relief, found himself on the floor of the room he was trying to escape from.

He looked with dread the the window closed and latched itself followed by the curtains pulling themselves together.

“Now is not the time to be climbing out windows.” Tremaine declared. Leon looked up to find both her and the Evil Queen standing by the entrance in his room.

“Who is that?” Leon asked, referring to the Evil Queen.

They ignored his question, the Evil Queen observed, “Oh! LadyTremaine! You’re right! She’s PERFECT! You said her name is Lea.”

Leon, I’m exhausted frustration rebutted once more, “Stop this! You’ve got to cut this out. You know I’m a man, and you know my name is Leon. Just let me go. Just let me leave.”

“Well...almost perfect...I know just the trick. Collect her and follow me.”

Lady Tremaine swing her gloves around and the next thing Leon knew was that his arms and legs were seized and he was being carried out of the room towards...
1153221122222111211121211221112112.title: A possession spell on Leon

choices: Lady Tremaine explores this new cooperation
11532211222221112111212112211121122.content:
Leon struggles against the clothes forcibly carrying him down the stairs right behind Lady Tremaine and the Evil Queen all the way until they placed him onto the middle of a long dining table the clothes that were carrying him still held onto his arms and tied themselves together under the table- binding him down.

“Whatever you’re doing,” Leo yelled, “you really have to stop!”

They continued to ignore him as the Evil Queen recited what sounded like jibberish.

Lady Tremaine approached Leo and quietly whispered to him, “Look at your new roommate, Lea!” And then directed his view towards a mirror right above him.

Right above him, in the mirror, where his reflection should have been, instead revealed a bikini clad woman looking hungrily at Leon.

“She’s gorgeous!” The woman in the mirror declared, “is that where I’m going?”

“Yes!” The Evil Queen answered.

“Oh! The things I’ll be able to do with that! So much to work with!”

“Come forth and seize your new life!” The Evil Queen said.

Leon watched fearfully as she dove out from the mirror and floated down like a feather, aligned her body with Leon’s until she fell right into his body. Their bodies overlapped and then became one.

The clothes holding Leon’s arms and legs released themselves and he shot up.

“What just happened?” Leon yelled, “what did you do?!”

Lady Tremaine brought Leon a hand mirror where he saw the mirror woman’s face replacing his between the wig and the outfit, “So I understand your name is Lea? I’m Lexi! Looks like we’re sharing a body no, girlfriend!”
11532211222221112111212112211121122.title: The dining room

11532211222221112111212112211122.content:
“Trust me, Evil Queen. We’ve got everything under control as far as Lea is concerned. We certainly don’t need any assistance from the likes of you. Please vacate the premises,” the Tremaine Dress told her.

The Evil Queen scoffed and left the room. She had never been disrespected so blatantly before. Such actions would not occur without consequence. While Tremaine was successful in finding and capturing Lea, the Evil Queen figured that it was HER that would be able to bring Lea to her highest potential.

But how would she go about collecting Lea?
