1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.content:
Leon was quickly changed out of his night attire and stood naked while all the clothes in the store surrounded him arguing about how they should be the ones to be worn by “her”

“Silence!” The center main display ordered, “while the maids outfit has a point that a job is important, it’s obviously just a blatant attempt to hog her for herself. You’ll get your turn, don’t worry. Yes, I’ve heard the arguments of the swimwear department and no one disagrees that she’ll look wonderful in you. But I think many of you are forgetting about how we need to work together. She can’t be thousands of different women, she can only be one. The choice of clothing that she wears today is the most important, because it sets the stage for the identity we’re going to create for her.”

The implications of this curse and arrangement grew more and more ominous for Leon as he was hearing the clothes plan out Lea’s life while he was left standing there while they decided the woman he was going to be.

“The first thing we need to do is establish her social circle, once that’s established- then she has a place in the world. Once that’s done, Lea officially has a life that we can build upon.”

The clothes cheered.

“For this first day, I select you,” the sleeve of the display moved the arm of the mannequin in the direction of floral printed sundress, “you will be tasked of making friends. When you return, you will report back to me what you were able to accomplish and all the ways that Lea didn’t corporate so that she can be disciplined.”

Leon gulped.

“Lea. Your neither feelings of your circumstances are no secret, neither is your experience with it. Any shortcomings of performance out there will be counted as your undermining us and you will be punished. I promise you, you have just interest in our success as we do”

The sundress selected the other articles that would be accompanying her on Leon while he wished from the bottom of his heart that Lori was going to come back with some information that would help him get out of this sooner rather than later.
1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.title: A sundress

1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.content:
Leon’s selected outfit tackled him and slithered all over his body until the commotion stopped and he found himself in his full outfit, his contemplation of his situation was cut short as the clothes quickly shoved him out the door, locking it behind him.

And just like that, he was stranded like this out in the world.

He tried to reopen the door that was shut behind him.

“I’m sorry, Miss, but the store doesn’t open for another hour and a half.” An old man yelled from his car.

“Oh!” Leon said, covering, “thank you.”

“Where did you park? I don’t see another car around here!”

“Oh! I parked it at my girl-“ Leon was about to say “girlfriend”, but was afraid of the displays punishment. Until he remembered girls say that too, “girlfriend’s house.”

“Do you need a ride?”

“Take it,” the dress whispered to him, “You DO NOT want to hike in these shoes.”

“Sure. Thanks!”

Leon got in the car and the old man drove off.

“Boy! You sure are a looker! I bet the boys all love you.”

“No!” Leon yelled with disgust before feeling a sharp pinch on his thigh, “ow! I mean... I don’t like to brag.”

“Not many girls like you that are both beautiful and modest. The fella you end up with is gonna be a lucky guy.”

“You’d be surprised...” Leon said under his breasts when his thigh was pinched again, “ouch!”

“Is everything alright? I’m not driving too rough am I?”

“No, I’m just a little sore from walking to that store.”

After more small talk the man eventually arrived at Lori’s residence, “you have a nice day Miss...?”

Leon groaned and reluctantly said, “Lea.”

“Miss Lea! Do yourself a favor and don’t talk any long walks again when you’ve already got a car.”

“You got it”

“Real quick, do you know a girl named Stephanie Cast?”

“I can’t say that I do.”

“That’s odd. You look just like one of her friends. I bet the two of you would get along well.”

“Maybe I’ll meet her some day.” Leon said trying to get to his car.

“Actually, she’s doing a girls day thing today you should give her a call! She’s really friendly and I think you all would get along great.”

“Oh...uhhh”

“Do it!” The dress forcefully whispered to him.

“Hmmmm” Leon continued contemplatively.

“Do it-do it-do it!” The dress continued while pinching him all over his clothed body.

“Okay!” Leon yelled in submission, before repeating it in an enthusiastic tone.

“Great! I just so happen to have one of her cards right here!” He gave Leon the card, “she’ll be so happy to hear from you!”

Leon wondered who that voice was, who’s house this was, and why he’d be expected here in this state.

Once upstairs, the clothes took him into a master bedroom, and placed him:
1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.title: A house Leon has never been to before

1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.content:
For the first time since he was ever cursed with the obsession of living clothes, they placed him down gently for once. He supposed it was just insult without injury as the spot they gently placed him down was immediately before a mirror. He didn’t know why dressing him like this wasn’t enough, they seemed to be insistent that he see how ridiculous he looked at each time.

“No thanks, I’m good” Leon exhaled with frustration as he began to turn away from the mirror. A couple of outfits grabbed him and faced him towards the mirror again as the rest of the clothes poured into the open closet.

“Fine, lets get this humiliation over with since you’re all so adamant about it.”

His eyes made their way up the legs, hips, and chest of his reflection. Each inch causing him to grow more and more nauseous.

His eyes made their way up to his neck and landing with a foreign confusions at his reflections smiling face. Leon was most certainly not smiling.

“Hi Leon!” His reflection greeted him.

Leon tried to back up from the mirror in fear, but the outfits at his side kept him in place, “who are you?”

“Leon...” the reflection laughed, “you know who I am, but if it makes you feel better, I’ll share the obvious with you. I’m Lea.”

“But Lea wasn’t real.”

“That’s true, Lea wasn’t real. The operative word being ‘wasn’t’. Throughout all these many years of you being surrounded by magic, Lea started to form. First as an embarrassment, then as a curse, then as an idea, then a concept. The magic combined with what the environment demanded of you eventually created me. The model, the princess, the bride-to-be...And then your girlfriends spell sorta woke me up, and given that I’m the magical part of you, I of course used my powers to bring you home.”

“This isn’t home!”

“No, this isn’t YOUR home, but it is mine. And just to save you the hassle from asking another question with an obvious answer, yes- I want to live my life with your body. As for now, I’ll have to live vicariously with what my cloth servants report to me in every mirror until I’m able to switch our stations leaving you to reflection duty.”

“You want to pull me into the mirror? What happens then?”

“You’ll just have to wait to find out.” Lea says, “you can come in now...”

The door opened and Leon saw the source of the familiar voice
1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.title: In front of the full body mirror

1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.content:
“Katie! What’s going on here? What is this place! What’s going on?!” Leon frantically asked.

“This is your, aka Lea’s house. I bought it in your/her name after you skipped out on your life”

“Please...Katie...in light of recent developments, it’s especially troubling for you to refer to me and,” while nodding to the mirror, “her...as the same person. You know she’s planning to take me over and trap me in her reflection, right? You’re my family...despite this indulgence you have in me being stuck like this, surely you don’t actually want me trapped in a mirror, do you?”

“This wouldn’t have happened if you could have just accepted things the way they were!” Katie argued, “nothing was ever good enough for you. Being a model wasn’t good enough for you. Then you got to be royalty-“

“A princess-“ Leon interjected.

“That wasn’t good enough for you,” Katie continued, ignoring Leon, “then you met a marvelous man that would do anything for you. Life granted you every dream I had wanted for myself- and you discarded every one of them...did you ever stop to think how that made me feel?”

“Katie...you’re a beautiful woman...”

“Thank you, so are you”

“No, don’t say that. What I mean is, you COULD have all those things. You SHOULD have all those things before me.”

“Please,” Katie said frustratedly, “I could spend hours working on my looks wishing to look half as good as you do normally.”

“Katie! Please!”

“No you! I already know what you’re going to say! That I should put more effort into making my life what I want it to be than putting you into the life I wanted. But you’re wrong. It’s supposed to be you- it was always supposed to be you. So yes, I took Lea’s royalties from her modeling, and I took the monthly stipend from the Queen to keep an eye on you in hopes of bringing you back. I took that money and bought Lea a house in hopes that fate would work out as it should- which it did. And yes, if I have to trap you in the mirror to ensure you don’t throw it all away to become ‘Leon’ again, then I will do what I have to do for your own good.”

Leon looked in horror at his cousin who was dead serious. He then down at his outfit reflecting on his recently lost freedom and this embarrassing states perceived permanence. He then looked over towards the mirror, the apparent next stop on this bizarre and tragic adventure of his. The Lea in the mirror winked and blew him a kiss.

As bad as things were now, he knew they were going to get much worse...
1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.title: Katie

1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.content:
Leon watched as Lea through the mirror walked back to the closet to grab a sexy nightgown. In real life, he watched as it floated over to him.

“We have to spruce you up! get you looking presentable!” Lea said as she pulled the placed the nightgown over herself, as Leon in the real world was forced into it.

“What for?” Leon asked.

“A lady should always look her best,” Lea answered, “but outside of that, there’s a friend of yours I’m hoping to meet.”

“Who?”

“All in due time, Leon...all in due time” Lea said, “Katie, do you have any estimation on when she’ll get here?”

“Probably in about 45 minutes” she answered.

“That doesn’t give us a lot of time!” Lea announced, “grab Leon here and take her to the bathroom so she can be freshened up!”

Leon was dragged into the master bathroom where Lea put make up on her reflection as that same makeup was applied to Leon. Aromas were applied and teeth were brushed and his hair was done.

“Hello gorgeous!” Lea said. Leon didn’t know if she was mocking him or was praising herself. Not that there was much to distinguish between the options, “take her to bed! We don’t want to scare off our new friend, do we?”

Leon was then escorted back to the large bed in the master bedroom. The lights were all knocked off and the house settled into a quiet slumber.

—

Leon waited five minutes to make sure all commotion had stopped before he crept up out of bed in his attempt to get as far away from Katie and Lea as possible. Each second around the both of them put him deeper and deeper into a danger exponentially worse than anything he had experienced prior.

He crept down the stairs, careful to avoid even the slightest creak in the steps. Once at the bottom of the stairs he approached the front door only to hear it open.

Leon held his breath as he tried to remain perfectly still.

Just as Leon was trying to stealth out of the house, this new figure was trying to stealth in. This became apparent as he heard the door mechanism whisper shut. Leon took a risk, “Who is that?”

“Leon? Is that you?”

He didn’t feel comfortable showing his hand, so he repeated, “who is that?”

“Leon! It’s Lori! I followed your magic here!”

“Lori? How did you get past the gate?”

“It was unlocked,” Katie said as she flipped on a light from the lounge adjacent to where they were, “Lori. Right on time- we’ve been expecting you.”

With the new illumination that graced the both of them, Lori looked at Leon first with shock which then transitioned to a confused approval. Leon noticed the positive transition in Lori’s response with unease.

“Please, the two of you- right this way. Or I’ll call the cops, Lori”

The two followed.
1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.title: During the night

1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.content:
Katie led the two of them into a well lit room, the walls appeared to be made of curtain.

Leon felt awkward entering an illuminated room with Lori regarding how he was dressed. With Lori he was just Leon wearing Lori’s clothes, but since being brought to this house- they full on made him Lea with a vengeance. Lori fully noticed as she caught glance of him, she couldn’t help but frequently glance at him in this state.

Katie directed Lori to sit in a chair located in the middle of the room. Once Lori was seated, Katie closed and locked the door before flipping a switch causing the curtain surrounding the room to slide away- revealing mirrored walls. The entire room was encompassed by mirrors.

Leon immediately knew what was going on as he nervously ordered, “Lori, come on! Let’s get out of here!”

Lori, still confused, obeyed Leon’s request as he grabbed her hand and headed for the door. Katie immediately jumped in front and blocked their exit.

“Not yet! Lori? Sit?”

Lori looked back and forth between Leon and Katie, confused as to what she should do.

“Sit,” Katie insisted, “Please Lori, sit. It’s important.”

Leon begged Lori not to return to the chair with his eyes, but accepted defeat when Lori gently withdrew her hand from his on her way to the chair at the middle of the room.

“Now, Lori- just keep your eyes at the mirror and everything will be explained.” Katie instructed.

Katie knew Leon was disappointed by her returning to the chair, she just didn’t want to get arrested. She looked at him through the mirror to silently apologize only to see the warmest, most endearing expression on what she believed to be his face.

As delightful as it was, she was a bit startled and she turned away to look at him in real life- confused to see the defeated expression he had when she let go of his hand.

“Lori! Please? Mirror?” Katie reminded her.

Back to the mirror to see that same warm expression on her boyfriends reflection.

“Lori...” Lea said, “it’s so wonderful to meet you!”

“What’s going on?” She asked confused.

“Don’t listen to her!” Leon pleaded.

“Don’t listen to who?” Lori asked, “that’s you!”

“It’s not me! It’s a curse!”

“Don’t mind her,” Lea said, “she’s just rebellious. I owe you a debt of gratitude. If it weren’t for you and your innate abilities, none of us would be here tonight. And I wouldn’t be able to meet you”

Lea sensually sauntered a crossed the room as she continued to speak while Leon worrying followed the movements and strides of his perfection.

“You know what I like about you? Your belief and ability of magic. You see, Leon here...she wants to live in a cold, dead ordinary world. She can’t tolerate the magical things in life.”

“No she can’t,” Lori agreed, another shot of worry hit Leon as she adopted Lea’s description of him.

“But thanks to you and your spell mastery- you have awoken the magic within Leon that she has been trying to escape for so long- me. You’re kind of a hero to me.”

“Please! Lori, don’t buy into this!”

“Shh!” She hissed at you. More compelled by the things this mystic reflection was saying. Completely taken in by the philosophy Lea was presenting and the movement of her body. Her eyes kept drifting down to take in the whole picture as she was strutting around her.

“Sometime soon, you’re going to make a decision. You’re going to have to figure out. What is it that brought you here? Why did you follow Leon here? Was it out of concern for Leon? Or were you more interested in following the magic? Once you figure out which is of greater interest to you- you’ll have to choose between the magic and the relationship. Not tonight...but eventually.” Lea said, “in the meantime- I want you to stay here, we’re going to have a lot of fun together.”
1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.title: Lori meets Lea

1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.content:
Leon and Lori were shortly after led upstairs into the master bedroom that Leon had originally tried sneaking out of and carted off to bed.

Leon’s plans had not changed- he was still adamant about getting out of this crazy house, while Lori was making herself comfortable. Leon had miscalculated the stillness of the house the last time, so he was going to make doubly sure that he could make a clean break this time.

“So...it’s kinda a random first night we’re spending together, right?”

“Absolutely,” Leon said absentmindedly, “Wait, what?” It was an odd question, made even more peculiar by the tone in which it was asked. It was almost jolly. Leon was having the worst day in recent history with even worse days in the pipeline while Lori was having FUN!

“Well, it’s just that. I wouldn’t have expected the first night we spent together you’d be looking like THAT nor would there be conversations with magic mirrors and all that...it’s all just so...I dunno...random.”

Was Lori insinuating that she was ready to have sex? It wouldn’t have been a complete salvation of his predicament, if so- but it would at least be some form of victory in the midst of everything. One quick go, then they could probably leave.

“Yeah...random...” Leon agreed with her terminology before he started kissing her passionately. At first she kissed back while she ran her hands through his made up hair, following them down to his neck before caressing the artificial breasts of his getup. Leon was put off by this, but he could look past it so he could have sex, whatever. He hadnt been intimate since before he stepped foot in the mansion all those years ago.

He ran his hand down and began to remove her skirt when she halted the making out to ask, “Leon...Leon...what are you doing?” he hand still gently caressing the artificial tits.

“I was just thinking...because you said first time we’re spending the night together that...”

“That didn’t mean sex...it just meant ‘the first night we spend together’”

“Oh...right...right...” Leon said, frustrated.

“I’m sorry if you got the wrong impression.”

“No, no...it’s fine...I’ve got other things I should focus on anyway.”

Lori scooted out from under Leon and pulled him to his side, “Come on let’s cuddle.” She faked like she was going to be little spoon, only to about-face and laid her head on the fake cleavage. Leon could look past her honing in on the breasts he appeared to have when he thought he was about to “get some” but this was becoming evermore troubling.

“What do you have to focus on?” Lori asked.

“What?”

“What do you have to focus on? You said that-“

“Oh right, right. Well...getting out of this house for starters.”

Lori lifted up and looked at Leon, “you want to LEAVE?”

“Well...yeah!” As though it were blatantly obvious.

“You’re just going to leave me here?”

“No! I’m gonna try and sneak us both out of here!”

“But I don’t want to go! At least not without saying goodbye.”

“If we say goodbye, they won’t let us leave.”

“But why do you want to leave?!”

“I don’t know if you’ve noticed this- but they kidnapped me and forced me to dress like this.” Leon was trying not to sound as annoyed as he was, “you know- like how you said, ‘it’s a random first night we’re spending together’”

“I didn’t say it was bad.”

“I’M saying it’s bad. I don’t like looking like this- especially with a girl I’m seeing.”

“You pull it off well!” Lori said supportively while burying her head back in the breasts.

“I’d like to pull it off immediately. I’ve spent WAY too much time being forced to be Lea, I just really want to be myself.”

“What’s wrong with Lea?”

“I’m not Lea.”

“I think Lea’s cool.”

“You know...if Lea weren’t trying to kidnap me, force me to dress like a bimbo, and take over my body to keep me this way- I might think she’s cool too.”

“So you’re really going to go...” Lori asked coldly.

“Absolutely.”

“Well, I’m staying here.”

“Why?”

“Because I like it here.”

Leon sighed in utter frustration, “fine. Have fun.” As he slid his arm out from underneath Lori, and rose up out of bed.

“You’re really going to go.” Lori said getting aggravated.

“She wants to suck me in a mirror. Trapping me with no control over my world or my appearance. Yes, I’m trying to avoid that.”

“So you’re just going to go.” Lori got further aggravated.

“What’s gotten into you? Keep it down!” Leon whispered.

“KEEP IT DOWN?! YOU KNOW WHAT?! JUST GO SONCE IT MEANS THAT MUCH TO YOU!”

Steps immediately approached the door and a key was heard sliding into a lock and locking the door.

Leon darted to the door and tried to open it to discover it had been locked. He shot a glance back at Lori with exasperation.

“Looks like you’re not going anywhere. I guess you’re stuck here with me!”
1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.title: That night

1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.content:
While Leon slept, he had the best dream.

During the night he dreamt...of absolutely nothing. Something about this curse from before it’s return seemed to deep into his subconscious to poke fun of his predicament- every night.

But that night was a sweet and pleasant void that he welcomed greatly.

It was so wonderful that he had forgotten the curse had returned. He lifted his eyelids and felt Lori next to him. A joy came over him remembering that him and Lori had slept together the previous night. Then little by little details about the events of the previous night came dripping back.

He looked at Lori, how she rested her head on his bra, then at the foreign room then at the mirror.

“No. No! NO!” He screamed in his mind as he remembered everything.

“Morning Leon!” Lea asked when he looked at his reflection.

“No, I don’t think so!” He said, grabbing a blanket from the closet and draping it over the mirror. It killed him to see himself in the ridiculous nightie as he approached the mirror- almost as much as feeling its gentle swat just beneath his hips.

When Leon has gotten up from bed, Lori began to wake up. She appeared to have forgotten the events of the previous night as well, because when she first laid eyes on Leon she started giggling unexpectedly.

“Yeah, yeah...laugh it up,” Leon said looking away angrily.

“No, no...Leon, I’m sorry,” Lori said, “I just forgot. I also want to apologize about last night.”

“Yeah?”

“Yeah...I was just so excited about magic and being celebrated for my magic that I didn’t think about what all of this must be like for you. I got a little selfish and I’m sorry. I’m also sorry I ruined your chance to escape.”

“Yeah?” Leon said, touched.

“Yeah,” she confirmed.

“You want to make it up to me?” Leon said, sliding back into be led before kissing her.

“Leon,” Lori stopped him again, “not while you look like...you know...her“ Lori nodded to the mirror to see the blanket draped over the mirror had been removed, refolded, and returned to the closet.

“What do you want?” Leon groaned.

“I wanted to say good morning to Lori- especially since Ms Leon was in a grumpy mood this morning.”

Through the sight of the mirror, Lea once again manipulated Leon to following her actions as she talked to Lori. Leon’s fingers grazed Lori’s upper chest and next, “Did you sleep alright?”

“I did,” she looked over at Leon as she said this.

“Look at me, not Leon” Lea said, suggesting she stare at the mirror while Leon was manipulated to kiss her on her neck. She moaned sensually and receptively.

Leon grew annoyed that she was more welcoming of these advances when they came from Lea than when he tried.

“Yeah, I sleep...”she hummed in satisfaction as Lea manipulated Leon into flirting with her body, “....great...“

“It was great having you over. I really like having you around,” Lea kissed her again.

“I like being around...” Lori said, beginning to slip into the sensual vibe, “Wait! Lea...I love Leon...”

Leon was surprised, this is the first time someone stuck up for him. He also felt weird as this conversation felt like it occurred when he wasn’t in the room.

“I know you do,” Lea said with a tone that sounded consolatory, like she was helping Lori work through something.

“And I want to help him return to normal.”

—

While Tremaine was having her conversation with Dr.Kimberly, Leon was in his old room being haunted by former memories while fighting with the door trying to get it to open.

“No! I can NOT be back here! I was out! I was free of all of this nonsense! I will not just fall back into it! I refuse!” Pausing only to notice the snickers, giggles and whistles coming from the closet and resuming with a renewed invigoration as a result.

Five minutes later the door calmly opened of its own accord. Leon made a run for it, only to be accosted by prom gowns immediately outside the room. He was once again grabbed by his arms and dragged down the hallway the same way he was dragged to his old room not even fifteen minutes prior.

The outfits dragged him to an old, warmly lit study and plopped him down on a vintage leather sofa where Dr. Kimberly was sitting in a chair just five feet away from him.

“Dr. Kimberly,” Leon yelled, “what’s going on? What are you doing here? What did Tremaine want with you?”

“Relax Leon,” she calmly said, “take a deep breath and calm down.”

Leon fell into the familiar routine of his sessions with her and complied- allowing himself to let go of his aggression.

“I’m calm,” Leon confirmed.

“Good.”

“Now can you tell me what is going on?”

“All will be explained in due time. Just relax and just focus on the soothing sound of my voice.”

“Okay...” Leon complied hoping it would yield the answers he sought.

“Now repeat after me. I am calm.”

“I am calm?”

“I am in a safe place.”

“I am in a safe...what?”

“In your state of ease, you feel compelled to lay down and close your eyes.”

“In my state of ease, I want to lay down and close my eyes.”

Leon felt a great desire to do just that, and so found himself in that position.

“I am happy to be so comfortable.”

“I am happy to be so comfortable.”

“I like it when I’m called ‘Lea’”

“I like it when I’m called...” Leon thought about the words he was repeating, “hey! Wait a minute! What are you doing?!” His eyes shot open and he was prepared to shoot up from the couch he was laying on when stocking wrapped itself around his wrists and ankles and tied him to the couch.

“You’re really going to do this to me? Hypnotize me into this? Why?”

“Sorry Leon, they won’t let me leave until I do this.”

“Well, I’M SORRY,” he sarcastically moaned, “but it’s your fault we’re in this position in the first place.”

“Leon, look at yourself,” Dr. Kimberly said while pulling out a mirror, “can’t you see that this is best for all of us.”

“I know what I look like! I’ve seen myself like this for what’s been just about most of my life!”

“No, Leon...look closer.”

Leon tried to see what Dr. Kimberly was referring to, looking deeper into the mirror but found himself to be inexplicably mesmerized.

“I see it,” Dr Kimberly said.

“I see it,” Leon repeated.

“I look beautiful”

“I look beautiful”

“I like being beautiful”

Dr. Kimberly continues with a series of statements that aimed to program a psychological cover over Leon’s brain. Inventing a new personality that Leon could be tucked inside of. She had never had the opportunity to be as wreckless with her abilities as this, and she felt a fulfilling sense of power and satisfaction of her abilities.

“My name is Lea,”

“My name is Lea.”

“Now...what is your name?”

Leon smiled in humor and said, “We’ve been over this. It’s Lea!” He laughed.

“Great,” she said, “and you will continue to be in this state of mind until you hear the word...”

Hypnosis couldn’t be complete without a wake up word- it’s hypnosis 101. Dr. Kimberly read multiple studies where Rewire hypnosis was done without a wake up word and the programming becomes very unwieldy and ends up backfiring. The mind is only open to this new mode of operation if it’s presented with a way out- for reasons yet to be discovered. Dr. Kimberly has to quickly think of a wake up word that she was sure Leon would never hear in his life as Lea. With a moments thought, she arrived at the perfect word.

“You will remain in this state of mind until you hear the word: pants”
1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.title: Dr. Kimberly hypnotizes Leon

“Five minutes until you’re set to go on, Lea. Are you ready?” A woman asked.

“Absolutely!” Lea chirped.

“Excellent!” The stage manager replied, “backup dancers- are you all prepared to go on.

“I WAS!” One of the mail backup dancers whined, “until Jared spilt his coffee all over my PANTS!”

Leon shuddered in his seat like he was shaken awake.

The stage manager grimaced, “Alex! What was the number one rule we told you about when we contracted you?”

“Not to say- oh no.”

“That’s right, Alex. Change out of your costume and pack your bags, because you’re fired, get out of here.” The stage manager ordered before turning to her assistant, “Kassie, quick- I need you to get Dr. Kimberly on the phone, tell her it’s an emergency.”

She then walked over to Leon still in shock over where he was and what he’s become since he was hypnotized. He was bleach blonde, tanned up, breasts(that he hoped were pads) up to his chin tucked inside a sparkly skimpy dress.

“Lea? Are you doing alright?”

“Where am I?!” He fearfully uttered, “what happened to me?”

“Just as I thought,” she said, “Kassie- where are we at with De. Kimberly. I need you to get her on the phone- pronto. Carol, let the venue know that there’s going to be a slight delay.” She directed her attention back at Leon, “Alright, Lea, we’re working on getting someone on the phone that will make you feel better okay.”

“This isn’t right. I’m a man. I shouldn’t be here. I shouldn’t be...THIS!”

“Listen, Lea- I don’t care what you are, you’re a goldmine. Do you know how much money you’re making tonight alone?”

“You knew?! You knew? And you turned me into this?!”

“I turned you into THIS,” she said holding up a poster of you with the banner “Lady Lea”, “I turned you into a STAR. And the people LOVE it. Now don’t be a fool and kill this cash cow we’ve got going for us. We’ll get Dr. Kimberly on the phone and we’ll keep this gravy boat floating!”

“No!” Leon yelled, “what am I going to wake up to next time? What will you have turned me into by then?”

“This was just a fluke, it won’t happen again.”

“That doesn’t make it better! How long have I been like this?”

“You’ve been my client for two years, I know that much.”

“YEARS?!” Leon yelled in shock, “why does this keep happening to me?”

“I’ve got her!” Kassie yelled.

“Great! Hand me the phone!” The stage manager talked to her on the phone, “yes. She woke up.... Yeah, I’ve got the mirror....I’ll show it to her...Lea! Look at the mirror! Look at the pretty pretty mirror! Look how beautiful you are!”

The ceremony was very tasteful and went off without a hitch, and the reception was occurring in Tremaine’s mansion- where the happy couple agreed to live. Lea and Arthur were sitting at a table while their closest friends presented them with toasts, the best man saving his toast for last.

1153221122222111211121211221112222132111.content:
Leon realized he wasn’t safe around any of these people. He didn’t know how many of them knew the truth about him, or knew how to reach Dr. Kimberly, but he knew all of them had a vested interest in keeping him Lea.

Leon lifted his dress so the he could walk. Made it to the stairs, looked back to make sure no one was looking and then ducked out the front door.

In the driveway to the mansion there were a mess of cars. Leon stared at them thoughtfully.

“You’re not thinking of leaving already Lea?! The parties just getting started!”

“Oh! I was just looking for something out or my car.”

“Okay, but if your dont come back we’re goig to have to rename you to LEAVa!” The man laughed, “but seriously the keys should be with the purses upstairs in one of guest bedrooms“

“Right. Of course. Thanks,” Leon said as he walked back inside.

He walked up the stairs in search of the purse room, poking his head in and out of different rooms as he walked stealthily around.

Upon finding the room with a bunch of purses stacked on top of the bed, he quickly snuck in and started digging looking for the first set of keys he could find to get out of here and get far away.

He heard the jingle of metal in the purse he was rummaging through and pulled out keys with the Lexus emblem on it.

“That’ll work!” He said to himself.

“You shouldn’t be up here, Lea.” Leon recognized that voice...

Leon remembered and quickly turned around to see Tremaine floating before him.

Leon tried to prance as quickly as he could out of the room when Tremaine closed the door before he could reach it and obstructed his access to it.

“Come on, Tremaine,” Leon tried to reason with her, “this has gone on for too long and has gone way too far. You’ve had your fun, but it’s time to return to my real life.”

“Oh Lea...this IS your real life. At this point this is more your life than the life you’re trying to return to.”

“Yeah...great, all of you are great at keeping me captive, ur that doesn’t change who I really am.”

“Just as your pleas repeated ad nauseum doesn’t change who you really are.”

Leon groan and tried to burst through Tremaine when Tremaine waved her hand and Leon’s dress floated in the air bringing him along with it.

“Nuh-uh-uh!” Tremaine wagged her gloved finger, “I wouldn’t do that...”

“Tremaine, it’s over...you might have been able to keep me here on my own a long time ago , but I’m supposedly married now. You don’t honestly expect me to go through the motions of that do you?”

“You raise a good point, Lea.”

“I do?”

“I’ll have your clothes prepare the basement. Now that we have company, we’ll need to make you more convincing- this will request proper training.”

1153221122222111211121211222.content:
As you sat on the bed in your motel room, thoughts ran through your mind. It felt so good to be free, no bondage, you could move without having your movements constricted. Since you were away from the mansion, you decided that maybe now you could change out of your lingerie and into your own underwear. Getting up from the bed, you walked out of your room towards your car so you could grab a bag that had your clothes. When you opened your trunk, you were a little disappointed as there was some furniture, and a couple of boxes but none were labelled 'clothes'.

"Maybe they're in the trailer." You thought to yourself as you closed the trunk.

Opening the trailer, you did notice a few boxes were bags that were labelled as 'clothes'. Only problem was they were in the back of the trailer, and you would've had to move other boxes and furniture to reach them. Frustrated you hit the side of your trailer. A few more cars pulled into the parking lot, visitors looking for an open vacancy.

"Everything alright, do you need a hand?" A woman from one the cars asked noticing your behavior.

Not wanting to cause a scene, you closed your trailer. "I'm fine thanks, just a little upset when I noticed some of the stuff I have packed in here fell over." You explained to the woman.

Heading back into your room, you decided may as well wear the lingerie a bit longer. Luckily the shirt and jeans you had on, so nobody would look at you odd for wearing a bra/panties. Sitting back on the bed and laying down, you thought where to go. To be honest you had no idea, besides being forced to model dresses, you liked living at the mansion. You didn't want to move back to your old town, it was rather dangerous and you were looking for any place to move. That's why you moved into the mansion at the 1st chance you got.

"I don't know what to do, I really don't." Thinking to yourself. "Should I move back to the mansion and give it another shot?"

Feeling tired, you decided to get a small nap in, you would figure out the rest later. After sleeping for 2 hours, the sun had set and you were growing hungry. Just as you got up to leave and get something to eat, there was a knock at the door. Curious as to who it could be, you answered the door revealing to be....Lady Tremaine.

"Good evening Leon, may I come inside please? I'd like to have a word with you." Replied Lady Tremaine. "Don't worry, it's only me here I promise."

The last you expected to see here was Lady Tremaine, you just left the mansion this morning. Not wanting to be rude though, you allowed her inside.

"Umm sure, come on in." You said closing the door behind her.

11532211222221112111212112221.content:
You sat on your bed as Lady Tremaine calmly took a seat from the chair in the room. Still slightly groggy, you turned your head towards her direction a little annoyed she was in your motel room.

"What do you want? If you came here to ask me to reconsider coming back to the mansion you can forget it." You said to her.

"Leon I know that you've already said no, but please where would you go? There isn't any major city around here for miles, I'm sure you already know that when you 1st came to the mansion. All there is around are just very small towns with very small population. Nobody likes to bother anyone's business that's why it's so quiet." Lady Tremaine explained to Leon.

"Where I go is not your business, this place feels likes the Bates Motel." You said getting up.

Walking over to the window, you stared at the sky as it was turning to dusk. The look on Leon's face was a sad and depressing picture, it almost looked as if the life had been sucked out of him and there was only an empty shell at the window. With the sun continuing to go down, Lady Tremaine noticed a sparkle around his chest, she looked harder and it appeared to be a pair of dog tags.

"Did you serve in the armed forces Leon, are those dog tags hanging above your chest?" Lady Tremaine asked curiously.

Leon turned away from the window for a moment towards Lady Tremaine, held his tags in the palm of his hand and then looked back out window.

"Yes, well 1 is mine and the other belongs to my brother. We both enlisted in the army, to make this short the unit we were in got ambushed in the jungle on a assignment we were on. I can't give any details because I don't like thinking about it. Anyway he went to check for survivors but as soon as he left there was an explosion. I panicked and in doing so I killed 3 innocent people, 2 were children. I quit the army soon after, they declared my brother K.I.A but I still feel he's out there somewhere." Leon explained without turning away from the window.

"I'm sorry to hear about the loss of your brother Leon. Perhaps some day you will find the truth and be reunited. Seeing as you're a veteran of the armed forces, Leon please come back to us. I can give you answers to questions you have. I honestly don't know if your brother is still alive or if he is dead, but I could at least set your mind at ease. I'll even bend some of the rules and allow you to work on the cars in your own clothes, sometimes at least. The choice is yours Leon, we'll either see you tomorrow morning or you can continue where you want to go." Said Lady Tremaine.

With that being said, she got up and walked out of the hotel room closing the door behind her.

He scanned desperately as best as he could for an open gas station. An open gas station however was out of the question, especially when he noticed a sign that read "Next gas 70 miles". Options and fuel running low he decided maybe he could knock on somebody's door and ask to borrow fuel. Except there didn't appear to be any homes nearby for miles, he was driving in a somewhat isolated part of the U.S.

A flash of lightning lit the sky, revealing a large mansion like home. "Come on baby don't die know, just a few miles." He said to his truck's sputtering motor. He managed to pull into the driveway, just as his motor died, out of fuel. Getting a look at the mansion up close now it had a creepy look to it.

"Well I guess I should see if anyone's home, or anyone even lives here." He stepped out of his truck into the storm. Reaching the front door, he knocked. After waiting a few minutes with no response he knocked on the door once again, this time the door opened. But nobody was there. Cautiously he stepped inside, it was dark but somewhat modern.

"Hello is anybody here?" He called out to no response, "I don't mean to intrude and I know it's late right now, but my truck ran out of gas and there isn't a gas station nearby."

With no response and it being so late, he was exhausted. Closing the door behind him, he noticed there was a large couch nearby with a blanket. He walked over, kicked off his shoes and laid on the couch pulling the blanket over him. In the morning he would walk to the nearest gas station, or maybe a neighbor lived close by. He got comfortable and fell asleep.

What happens now?

The nano bots are still there and there discovered the implant months ago and got rid of it, as far as they are concerned it was a foreign object that wasn't meant to be there.

You don't get why George is panicking... He have been at it like rabbits Alex and haven't used any protection.

Yes and... A few seconds later... "FUCK" no i could be pregnant.

You said you've been feeling a little ill recently haven't you.

Both you and George leave the apartment and go to the pharmacy and pick up a pregnancy rest.

You use it and it's....
14531111112122112.title: The next day

145311111121221121.content:
The test is a very expensive one it even tells you how far along you are.

It says you are...
145311111121221121.title: Positive (you are pregnant)

1453111111212211211.content:
You fall to the floor in shock as you discovered your three months pregnant but you haven't had morning sickness and you don't have a bump to speak off.

George helped you up off the floor and hugged you and said "we'll deal with this Alex".

A month later

You've got used to it and a small bump has appeared now and you're just getting on with it although your not enjoying it, your just trying to forget about it and carry on with your life.

You continue going to the gym and do light exercises although you've found yourself been really horney at times and George helps you out in the department.
1453111111212211211.title: Twelve weeks along

14532.title: nah, more options

145321.title: Alien clothes - Gender setup

1453212.title: Girl

choices: The purple latex bodysuit assimilates the farmer's clothing.
The purple latex bodysuit attacks and restrains the farmer.
14532122.content:
At approximately two o'clock in the morning, a space pod of extraterrestial origins, which appeared to be more like a shooting star, flashed across the night sky before quickly crash landing within one hundred feet outside of a lone human farmer's house.

The impact caused a very loud explosion, loud enough to wake the previously sleeping farmer, but not loud enough to attract any other unwanted attention.

The farmer, being curious of what the explosion was, quickly got up, arming himself with a handgun and a flashlight to go and investigate what the loud noise was.

It did not take him very long to reach the crash zone, at which point he slowed down and pointed his weapon towards the thing that just crashed.

"Hello, is anybody there?" The farmer asked loudly, with a steady grip on his gun.

No response.

The farmer slowly inched towards the space pod, before he finally had a quick glimpse of what was inside.

For only half a second, he could see this large, purple, and moving slime organism that was beginning to seep out of the edges of the crash-landed space pod before...
14532122.title: Be the suit

choices: The purple latex bodysuit experiments further with its own powers.
The purple latex bodysuit walks back into the farmer's house.
145321221.content:
"What th-" The farmer could barely get out his next word before he saw a blur of purple goo flying into his face.

The force of the slime was enough to knock him off his feet, at which point the alien organism took advantage of this time to begin enveloping the farmer's face and entire body.

Because the farmer was knocked out cold, the catsuit-slime took its time in covering every square inch of the man's body in its slime.

The alien sludge oozed its way into every orifice of the man's body, and continued down to his lower body, carefully coating his crotch, legs, and feet in slime.

Oddly enough, this action did not kill the farmer, nor did it dissolve his clothing, as he was still able to breath despite the slime covering his nostrils, eyes, and mouth entirely.

Once the thing finished this human-cementing-slime-job, it started to thin out more, and like a vacuum, meticulously squeezed itself into a much more realistic human shape, in fact, it was taking on the shape of the farmer's body!

During this molding process, the alien slime was taking in information about the man's life and memory through the clothes that he was wearing, as well as his skin. This transcription between the slime and the man's clothes and body left the man's clothes, memory, and health, intact, however.

And if the slime had to ever leave this host body, it would inject an amnesiac into the man's brain, so as to leave no trace of it ever being there.

After no more than two minutes of this entire process, the slime had become a perfect clone of the human farmer.

The natural form of the alien was this:
http://www.2inc.net/image/cache/data/201...
but for purposes of keeping its cover hidden, it could easily switch between that form and looking exactly like the human farmer.

Because there wasn't a single other human being for miles around, the alien suit took on its natural, feminine form, with the human farmer safely tucked away inside, providing a quick disguise if needed.

The slime could do that by becoming completely transparent, then microscopically thin, and allowing the human host inside to take on the shape of the slime's body.

Perhaps later on it could evolve to do that without a human host, but for now...
145321221.title: The purple latex bodysuit assimilates the farme...

15.content:
A person walked into a clothing shop that wasn't there the other day. The shopkeeper then appears behind the counter and says, "Would you like to hear a tale about these clothes?"

The visitor then nods.

"I'll bring out some clothing. Choose one and I'll tell you about their tale." The shopkeeper said.

The shopkeeper put some clothing down on the counter.

"What about some panties that slowly change the wearer's clothes to a Gothic Lolita style? Doesn't matter if the wearer is female or male, there will be a change to their clothing. Would you like to hear their tale?

What about a cat ears headband? Perhaps they'll made their previous wearers act more like a cat? Or maybe the headband had changed their wearer into a Catboy/catgirl?

Perhaps you've heard about a special leotard? One that allows the use to expand any part of their body?

And of course, there's the costumes. They slowly change the wearer into what the costume are imitating.

But perhaps you'd like something else?" The shopkeeper asked.
15.title: Pick a tale

155.content:
"I'd rather hear about a tale about some other article of clothes." The visitor said.

"Clothes, jewelery, or costumes?" The shopkeeper asked.

The visitor then chose...
155.title: Something else

info.brief_description: When clothes are either possessed or come alive, are you still the owner?
info.description:
What if one day, your clothes were either possessed or came alive? What would they feel about you? Would they like you? or would they treat you like a possession?

If you have any questions, feel free to ask me them. At the current time, I'll also correct the spelling of the chapter.

I'll give GP for chapters. 100 for a chapter that has plot and 10 for a chapter that merely gives choices. Due to changes in giving GP, 200 for a plot chapter. 100 for a 'kinda counts' chapter. Nothing for a chapter that merely adds more choices.

Some notes
1.)- A name with commas around it means that the character is not themselves and are being used by something/someone.

2.) if it's wearable, it's clothes. Shirts, skirts, shoes, pants, dresses, jewelry, Etc. But if you want to make sure, send me a PM and ask if it's allowed.

3.) *Edit on September 1st, 2015* No copy-and-pasting will be allowed from now on unless you are the one who originally wrote the stuff. There will be some leeway if one gets permission from the original writer, but credit must be given in the chapter. The chapter will be deleted if it turns out that credit wasn't given, or if the chapter was copy-and-pasted without getting permission.

What's allowed -

Body expansion
inflation
Weight gain
Sex (please lead up to it.)

What's not allowed -

Scat
graphic violence
Ending chapters
Drugs
Anything sexual with anyone below the age of 16. Either age them up or don't involve them during the sexual moments. Refuse to follow this rule and I will delete your chapter. EDIT on March 6th, 2018 : I will be lenient on de-aging men to 10-14, as long as femdom is involved.

What's on the fence that you need to contact me about before adding it in a chapter or put up a warning in the title-

incest (put up a warning, like adding (W!) in the title)

Transgender or genderchange (Put a (TG!) in the title or I will delete the chapter!) (After much thought, I'll be really lenient on this rule. Try to follow it every once in awhile. After all, Series like Ranma have TG as a major part of it, so stuff like that gets a pass.)
